JS projects related with CV & 3D

  • 3D Poses Viewer : visualise poses withs its rgb image (can be used directly from 3D Recorder)
  • Video3D Editor : visualise volumetric video (TODO also edit)
  • FPS game gravity; collision; mouse&keyboard game mouvement
3d Recorder is an Android app for Huawei phone with Tof camera to record poses and volumetric video. Experimentations:
  • Rgbd Viewer & OpenCV (webpack)
  • Test Image CV via Open CV
  • Test Image CV via VanillaJS
  • three.js demo (vanilly, es6 module)
  • Projection experimentation
  • Raymarching
  • VR
  • Photo360
  • Video360
